title: fslswapdim_exe
description: Tool to swap the x, y, z axes dimensions of an image

axis_a.title: Axis A
axis_a.description: New x-axis in terms of old axes (-x, x, y, -y, z, -z)

axis_b.title: Axis B
axis_b.description: New y-axis in terms of old axes (-x, x, y, -y, z, -z)

axis_c.title: Axis C
axis_c.description: New z-axis in terms of old axes (-x, x, y, -y, z, -z)

output_file.title: Output File
output_file.description: Output image file (optional, cannot be used with --checkLR flag)

checkLR_flag.title: Check Left-Right Swap Flag
checkLR_flag.description: Option to check if the specified arguments lead to a Left-Right swap or not, cannot be used with an output name
